name: Крем для лица Чёрный Жемчуг Интенсивное омоложение 56+ дневной 50мл
ingredients: Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isopropyl Isostearate, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Alanine, Ammonium Lactate, Betaine, Boron Nitride, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil (масло камелии),Caprylyl Glycol, Carnosine (карнозин), Cetearyl Methicone, Cholesterol, Diazolidinyl Urea, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Dipropylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Ethylparaben, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Soy Flour, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Isohexadecane, Maltitol, Methylparaben, 1-Methylhydantoin-2-imide, Parfum, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor, PEG-40 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Propylparaben, Retinyl Palmitate, Serine, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trideceth-6, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract (экстракт водоросли ундария), Xanthan Gum.
